doc.knownrelatives: Eric Lehnsherr (Magneto, father), Pietro Maximoff (Quicksilver, brother), Magda (mother, presumed dead), Django Maximoff (adoptive father, deceased), Marya Maximoff (adoptive mother, deceased)
doc.powers: The Scarlet Witch can tap into mystic energy for reality-altering effects; this power leads to the creation of "hex-spheres" which are reality-disrupting quasi-psionic forces that can cause molecular disturbances in a target's probability field, resulting in spontaneous combustion, deflection of objects in flight, and so on.
